cwitools.utils.get_specres¶

cwitools.utils.get_specres(hdr)¶

Get the approximate spectral resolution based on the header

The returned values for various KCWI settings are taken from the estimates on KCWI’s home page at keck.edu. PCWI returns R = 2000 for the Richardson grating and R = 5000 for all others.

Parameters

hdr (astropy FITS Header) – The header

Returns

The spectral resolution, R for the grating/slicer used.

Return type

float

Raises

ValueError – If grating or slicer name is not recognized
